summary: Project now includes an intro/landing page that links into the Home page, using a provided photo as the intro visual.

existing_features.title: Create a new Intro page that uses the uploaded image "brotherhood of copper banner-1.png" as the primary intro visual and provides a clear call-to-action that navigates the user from Intro to the Home page.

Update routing so the application opens on the Intro page and the Home page is accessible via a dedicated route, ensuring navigation flows Intro → Home without breaking existing routes (/ranks, /divisions, /lore, /history, /photo, /posters).
Adjust the site navigation behavior to account for the new Intro page so users can still reach Home easily and the Intro page is not mistakenly labeled as Home.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an Intro page that links to the Home page (Intro → Home) and use the provided photo as the intro visual.

projectName: Add Intro landing page (Intro → Home) using provided banner image
